title: Madi Policy (v1)
description: Defines a Madi Policy (v1) containing multiple rules that can be evaluated against JSON objects.

ref.description: A identifying reference to this rule; preferably a unique identifier.

action.description: The action to take if the rule selection matches the schema.

select.description: A JMESPath expression to select the object to evaluate against the schema.

schema.description: A JSONSchema (draft 7) to evaluate the selected object against.

strict.description: If true, the rule will fail if the schema does not match the selected object.

description.description: A human-readable description of the rule.

v.description: The version identifier of the policy schema.

ref.description: A identifying reference to this policy; preferably a unique identifier.

strict.description: If true, the policy will fail if any rule fails.

description.description: A human-readable description of the policy.

rules.description: An array of rules to evaluate against JSON objects.
